name: Fighting Sword Master
description:
Fighting Sword Master

Can you defeat the Sword Master?

Use your skills to strike your opponent and become the new Sword Master!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was developed as a sample project of the GRD_FSM asset. This asset implements a Finite State Machine in Unity, with a node editor and simple integration into any game. You can find the asset project on my GitHub page: https://github.com/GusGiardi

---------------------------------------------------------------------

GAME CONTROLS

Directional Keys: Move

X: Jump

C: Attack

Z: Defend

---------------------------------------------------------------------

MUSICS

Spooky Dungeon by Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio

The Good Fight by Christovix

Victory! by Viktor Kraus

Metamorphosis by Viktor Kraus
